name: Duo Platformer
description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to my new game,

PLATFORMER DUO

This game has only 3 levels and being made in a 10 days!

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Switch Player - Left Click

Sprint - Left Shift

Note : 

You cannot move crate and barrel in the game!

I made this game alone (Character and Animations being downloaded from Mixamo)

Suggestions are always welcome 😊😊 

I hope you enjoy the game! Let me know what you think in the comments :)

Thanks!

Regards - The Coder GD
